experience.title: Front End Developer
experience.description: As a Software Developer consultant at Kin and Carta I have had oppurtunities to learn and develop on multiple technoligies including Java, Swift, Angular, and React. I have used these technologies to help my teams create enterprise level apps in both the Agriculture and Security spaces.

experience.title: Assistant Boy's Head Counselor and Web Developer
experience.description: As an Assistant Head Counselor at Loras All Sports Camp I am on the Administrative Staff that helps run the camp week after week. This role involves being a leader to the 28 Boy's counselors working the camp. Responding to problems that pop up in a quick and orderly manner is a crucial part of this job. As a web developer for Loras All Sports Camp I worked directly alongside the front office to assist them in making their ideas a reality on their company website. LASC hopes to use their new website as a marketing piece to boost their already multi-million dollar annual revenue.

experience.title: IT Recruiter
experience.description: My role at MMD Services is to seek out qualified candidates to fill contract and direct hire opportunities in the Information Technology industry.

experience.title: IT Contractor
experience.description: At Nemera I worked directly with the rest of the IT team, I was on a eight week contract for a project they needed extra help on. We succeeded in finishing this project in our scheduled time.

projects.name: Calculator
projects.description: In the process of learning React, it is only done correctly if you create a calculator and handle all of the logic yourself. Here is mine.
